Flicker::

"I'll try."  Flicker takes another glance around.  "Some of these new 
recruits aren't greenhorns, though.  I've got a hunch that could 
cover the hostage angle very well if I'm right.  Speaking of time, 
I'd better get going.  I'll update you when I have the chance, 
Flicker out!"

The Predacon spy stashes his secret comm-link and heads for the med-
bay.  If he could get in there alone, it would be a perfect 
opportunity to prepare an equalizer in case his cover was blown.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <silvanna2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> "We have few time then" replied the male "Listen, we need time and 
> info... Time, we haven't enough so we will need info. We need to 
know 
> who will be involved in the attack and stuff like that. Even you 
can 
> suggest that the new recruits aren't too trained to attack and they 
> might result seriously injured... that Hidras might be very 
dangerous 
> and maximals need to know more of him... Say whatever you think 
that 
> will do to Maximals delay the attack... I wonder if you can find 
out 
> if other factions are involved" Perceptor thought a second and 
> finally said "Flicker, we might need a good hostage so I wonder if 
> you can find out who is close of Leader... Ya know: a friend, the 
> second in rank... A girlfriend would be the best..."
> 
>

picking
